column4: I had a question: I went to the ubuntuone website, and installed the PPA from the link, and the repository shows up on software source, but Ubuntuone doesn't show up in Synaptic Package Manager, any ideas?
did you update? or press reload in synaptic?
reloaded and rebooted just to make sure :(
ah ok the reboot wasn't necessary; don't know then.
